attributes.imagesize: '''House Humble ''' is a vassal house of the Iron Islands that holds fealty to House Greyjoy.==Members==*Adrack Humble, an ironborn raider. Flayed alive by Ramsay Snow.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Humble is a lesser house, looked down by the members of ancient and proud houses of the Iron Islands because Humbles descend from thralls and salt wives.==See also==*AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)==References==reflistIronIslands HousesDEFAULTSORT:Kenning, HouseCategory:House Humble

'''House Humble ''' is a vassal house of the Iron Islands that holds fealty to [[House Greyjoy]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Humble is a lesser house, looked down by the members of ancient and proud houses of the [[Iron Islands]] because Humbles descend from [[thrall]]s and [[salt wives]].
sections.Members: *{[[Adrack Humble]]}, an [[ironborn]] raider. Flayed alive by [[Ramsay Snow]].
